description: Defines React functional components for rendering table UI elements with various parts such as header, body, footer, rows, cells, etc. It also exports these components for use in other parts of the application.

methods.name: Table
methods.description: Main table component that wraps a `<table>` element with styling and forwarding ref.

methods.name: TableHeader
methods.description: Component for rendering the table header section `<thead>`, with styling and ref forwarding.

methods.name: TableBody
methods.description: Component for rendering the table body `<tbody>`, with styling and ref forwarding.

methods.name: TableFooter
methods.description: Component for rendering the table footer `<tfoot>`, with styling and ref forwarding.

methods.name: TableRow
methods.description: Component for rendering a table row `<tr>`, with styling and ref forwarding.

methods.name: TableHead
methods.description: Component for rendering a table header cell `<th>`, with styling and ref forwarding.

methods.name: TableCell
methods.description: Component for rendering a table data cell `<td>`, with styling and ref forwarding.

methods.name: TableCaption
methods.description: Component for rendering the table caption `<caption>`, with styling and ref forwarding.
